fields.Name: Austin Bitcoin Design Club live crit
fields.Description: There will be a live design review of 2-3 Designathon projects. Shout-out to the [Austin Bitcoin Design Club](http://abdc.dev).

fields.Name: Prize announcements
fields.Description: You'll have a couple of days to rest after all the work during the Designathon and then we'll jump onto a call and announce who will receive the prizes. Join us there as we wrap up the Designathon.

fields.Name: UX Research workshop
fields.Description: This workshop will be focussed on providing tools and knowledge to teams based on how to do quick research that is specific to the project which they are working on. Projects will have a few mins to quickly share some details about what they are working on and research suggestions based on the Bitcoin UX Research toolkit will be provided. These are for those who would like to adopt a user first or data driven approach to building their product.

fields.Name: Design-a-Note – Make Bitcoin Printable
fields.Description: In this workshop, we’ll explore the world of printable bitcoin ecash notes and show you how to use [brrr.gandlaf.com](https://brrr.gandlaf.com), a tool that turns sats into handout-worthy paper notes. We’ll walk through how the tool works, share a bit of the history behind printable bitcoin projects, and showcase inspiring examples from past bitcoin note design. This session also serves as a primer for the Design-a-Note challenge—so if you’re thinking about submitting a design, or just want to learn what it’s all about, this is a great place to start.

fields.Name: Kick-off call 2
fields.Description: Join us if you can to start the designathon in a video call. If you can't make it, all updates will also be posted in the #designathon channel on Discord.

fields.Name: Global Accessibility Awareness Day workshop
fields.Description: Join our intro to accessibility workshop, in honor of [Global Accessibility Awareness Day](http://accessibility.day).

fields.Name: Kick-off call 1
fields.Description: Join us if you can to start the designathon in a video call. If you can't make it, all updates will also be posted in the #designathon channel on Discord.
